title: Part One: The Moonies Are So Much Worse Than You Could Possibly Imagine
itunes:title: Part One: The Moonies Are So Much Worse Than You Could Possibly Imagine
description:
Christopher Wong is joined by Robert Evans to discuss the many crimes of Reverend Sun Myung Moon and his family.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. https://u1lib.org/book/5533978/0e7f3c
  2. https://u1lib.org/book/683849/cb6752
  3. https://12ft.io/proxy?q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chicagotribune.com%2Finvestigations%2Fchi-0604sushi-1-story-story.html
  4. http://www.tparents.org/Library/Unification/Publications/Smm-Org/works_communism.html
  5. http://www.tparents.org/Library/Unification/Books/Messiah2/Messiah-2.pdf
  6. https://newrepublic.com/article/115512/unification-church-profile-fall-house-moon#footnote-115512-3
  7. https://www.minnpost.com/politics-policy/2012/09/remembering-former-rep-don-frasers-battle-moonies/
  8. https://www.irishtimes.com/news/moonies-accused-of-involvement-in-drugs-1.1161827
  9. https://u1lib.org/book/2483311/694fff
  10. https://www.businessinsider.com/donald-trump-speaks-at-moonies-911-event-praises-unification-church-2021-9
  11. https://freedomofmind.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/02/fraserport.pdf
  12. https://www.nytimes.com/1998/05/02/business/worldbusiness/IHT-reverend-moons-group-wants-to-talk-investment.html
  13. https://www.nytimes.com/1999/11/28/world/suspicion-following-sun-myung-moon-to-brazil.html
  14. https://www.deseret.com/1999/11/28/19477721/moon-sees-a-new-garden-of-eden-in-brazil-br-but-unification-founder-s-proposal-spurs-opposition
  15. https://www.thriftbooks.com/w/heartbreak-and-rage-ten-years-under-sun-myung-moon_k-gordon-neufeld/1821376/#edition=3308299&idiq=35159710
  16. https://culteducation.com/group/1277-unification-church/23755-rev-moon-son-made-gun-.html
  17. https://www.npr.org/sections/thetwo-way/2018/03/01/589808670/ar-15s-are-biblical-rod-of-iron-at-pennsylvania-church
  18. https://www.nytimes.com/1990/04/19/style/chronicle-983090.html
  19. https://foreignpolicy.com/2012/09/04/the-strange-life-of-reverend-sun-myung-moon/
  20. https://www.npr.org/2012/09/02/159032325/rev-moon-a-savior-to-some-lived-a-big-dream%20%20
  21. https://www.splcenter.org/fighting-hate/intelligence-report/2005/washington-times-editor-and-wife-promote-radical-right-agenda
  22. https://www.npr.org/2010/02/17/123805954/unification-church-woos-a-second-generation
  23. https://books.google.com/books?id=AabywLOknbsC&pg=PA59&dq=fraser+kcia#v=onepage&q=fraser%20kcia&f=false
  24. https://www.nytimes.com/1976/12/29/archives/sun-myung-moon-is-criticized-by-religious-leaders-jewish-patrons.html
  25. https://u1lib.org/book/656675/0cceef
  26. http://content.time.com/time/
